name: ParameterChecker_checkParameterTest
description: Unit tests for the ParameterChecker.checkParameter method, which validates parameters in a map.

test_cases.name: testCheckParameter_ValidParameter
test_cases.description: Tests the checkParameter method with a valid parameter in the map.

test_cases.name: testCheckParameter_MissingParameter
test_cases.description: Tests the checkParameter method when a required parameter is missing, expecting a BinanceConnectorException.

test_cases.name: testCheckParameter_WrongType
test_cases.description: Tests the checkParameter method when a parameter has the wrong type, expecting a BinanceConnectorException.
